name: EMIT Vol. 3: Watashi ni Sayonara o
overview: EMIT Vol.3: Watakushi ni Sayonara wo (ＥＭＩＴ Vol.3 ～私にさよならを～) is one of three English training games released by Koei for the Sega Saturn in rapid succession in 1995. The game consists of a series of videos which can have either English or Japanese audio or subtitles (changeable any time during playback) interspersed with English training exercises.
